lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It’s this way, and do I see any, I don’t see what -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don’t see anyone, you just see Pike burst out of her room suddenly, bloodied.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I’m going to run past her room towards the west, and do I have a view right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now have a view of a guy beaming with divine light, trying to pat out divine flames after swinging and getting a nice heavy wound on Pike, who looks like she’s barely standing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I’m going to take a couple -

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck him up. Fuck him up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he takes care of you, though...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I draw my sword and I’m just going to go stabby on the bastard because I haven’t reloaded my gun yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the end of your movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have a fourth shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a fourth shot and then another one, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on this shot, by the way, because of the Guiding Bolt that she did to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because the divine fire that’s surrounding him is lighting him up like a giant birthday candle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that’ll be 28 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage on that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that was just the first one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That’s okay, I still rolled well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was hoping for a critical, but whatever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I’m not going to need it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He’s in a really bad place right now and is looking over the back window, realizing he’s probably going to -

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck it, let’s burn an Action Surge. This’ll be funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch. It’s obscured to see; all you see is the moonlight from the outside sky coming through and the silhouette of his head, and now the missing silhouette of his head - as you scatter the top half of his skull across the stone surrounding the window in Pike’s room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I drop a health potion and then steady to take care of that and reload my guns with the rest of my turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don’t remember you saying he redipped, right? He used his poison last time and I made the save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 10 points of piercing damage. No poison.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, I’m nervously playing with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then with the second strike he’s going to stab down once more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That’s just a bonus to do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you get up, he just stabs and stabs again, and this time as your finger’s extended the pain hits you and you just watch your vision fade to darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has no more attacks, so he just watches you go limp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For my turn, I’ll be dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go to the ledge and look over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drawing the blade, chuckling, throwing it up in the air, catching it, and is preparing to go down for some finishing blows.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My stuff doesn’t go that far, does it? Any of my vocal spells, only goes 60 -

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, for my action-slash-attack, I, overcome with fury seeing my friend on the ground, pull out Mythcarver and just fucking jump and plunge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I’ll say for the purposes of this action, you will have advantage on the strike, as -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you should have had disadvantage earlier for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll with advantage your attack against the rakshasa.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 14. 15. Plus I don’t know what! I don’t do these things!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be your proficiency bonus plus your -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your d8 plus damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus 1d6 force damage. 6! Holy shit! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the damage you take from the fall...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don’t know what that expression was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know, is that good or bad? Both?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It’s either a lot or a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You let go of it as you slam into the ground and he draws it out with a spurt of blood and throws it to the ground angrily, spinning around towards you, still holding the dagger aloft, looking over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I still get my bonus action?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so I, on the ground, turn over to Vax and I’ll bonus Healing Word him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Put up a good fight! Put up a good fight!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I couldn’t even join in because it was so good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 4! I’m rolling great! Plus 5. So you have 9 hit points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance out the corner of your eye and see that Hotis is still standing with the dagger up on top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was just my turn in the initiative. Can I go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They actually got initiative higher than you, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your turn hasn’t happened yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I totally - I trust in you, Matt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I heard him say, "I’m going down," right? We all heard him say he’s going down as he was falling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It’s a tower, Probably jumped off the tower!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look out and I say, "Oh, Pike, you’re in your birthday suit! "Are you all right?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I’m fine, I’m fine, I’m fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, did I take - I took a potion on the -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he had the potion on the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I’m going to be fine, I’m going to be fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a window in the hallway? My question is, is the courtyard through those windows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The courtyard would be over here, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In relation to where we are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is no longer really part of the deal, so in relation to where you guys are, they’re about here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do all of the rooms have windows, or is there a window in the hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of the rooms that have windows are the ones on that side, so currently the only way to get here would be to travel back where you came from and find an exit out to the top of the -

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to try and handle that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do those stairs go to the west tower, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These stairs go to the west tower, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still move, though, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the room, in the door behind you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I can go back in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should just stay there if you’re going to make a door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to jump from really high?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I’ll stay there, because she’s right beside -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your movement you have to use now, or it’s lost.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have to choose what she’s going to do? I'm so confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You won’t be able to do an action because you’re trapping yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like, "I’m holding everything "until she makes a door."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your impulse hit now and if you decide not to move, then the impulse loses the movement, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don’t know what to say, I -

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you can’t really do anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just stand there dumbfounded that Pike is naked and cut to shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I’m going to reach over, put on my circlet in my nightgown.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I’m going to blast a door into that wall, blast a giant hole. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (boof) As you tear this wall open there -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: - it opens up before you and you can see a little bit of it gets pushed to the side, because it’s a little bit elevated from the the roof area, but you force it upward to where it bursts open and creates a slight ramp that leads up to what would be the roof of this part of Whitestone Castle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Cool. And then I’ll - Can I see Pike from where I am?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I’m going to look at her and give her a Healing Word, just a level 1 Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have a little bit of movement if you want to use it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I’ll step back a little bit out of Grog’s way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it’d be there, probably, far as you can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Vax. Your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but I can’t do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn’t say you were holding an action for anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wanted to move through the door once she made it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You’re generally not supposed to do -

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I say, I hold a dash? Or a hold a movement?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to hold a dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So yeah, then you just go ahead and -

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then she moves and then you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as Keyleth opens the window, you dash up and rush onto the rooftop, and there you can see across the way...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give him a good-game smack on the ass as he runs by.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He’s got his normal clothes on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I only sleep naked in the lady-favors house.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grabbing a weapon off the ground, that’s a freebie, right? Is that a bonus action? I feel like that’s - I think that’s free?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of an action, you can pick it -

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I’m going to grab it and use my movement to stand, and I also noticed that we’re flanking Hotis, so I’m going to sneak-attack the motherfucker up the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Just as a note, the way that the bonus attack works - well, this is with your haste ability.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The haste would’ve faded once you went unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you use your action for anything else, you don’t get the bonus attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So is picking something up not a free action? I thought picking up a weapon was a free action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It’s whatever you’re attacking, you then get to throw this in this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let me ask you this because if I understood that I wouldn’t have cast the spell, so I’m happy to skip the spell and then cut the -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of the action economy, the idea is that because you’re attacking with one, you can give yourself an opening to get a quick strike with the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And flanked is at advantage, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An ally nearby, was it not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, he’s not flanked because the other ally is prone and is not currently threatening his face -

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I’ve used an action but not the bonus action, so I’m going to disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are all distracted at this point, turns around, takes a dagger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That’s the one that ran that way. He’s mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, the Whitestone guards are shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is all happening so fast!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don’t they stand on the wall? Don’t they stand on places?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They’re all watching The Sound of Music in the rec room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vasselheim, yeah, they’re on the lax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you need? What? What’s wrong?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 6 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I can’t find my dagger for some reason. My gloves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be 18 against you, Pike? That does hit you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 4 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the snare glove is 1d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34 points of piercing damage, all together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, the wall just opened up, so I’m going to shout for Trinket to run after the assassin throwing the knives.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I go up on my broom, will I be able to see them down in the courtyard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if I run out the door - right, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: is this all on the broom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if I’m in the air, can I see down at...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: TALIESIN, ASHLEY, AND LAURA: (singing) You’ll be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so from up there as you (shhh) shoot out above, looking down, you can see where they lie on the battlefield there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to shoot the rakshasa! (all laugh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! I’m going to use my Longbow of the Sky Sentinel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were born for this stuff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to shoot the rakshasa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that’s a good one. That is 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Just as a note, what’s your alignment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don’t know what it means.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do know what it means?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean I do not as good damage to him or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. 12 for the first because I forgot to Hunter’s Mark him because I’m a genius because I’m just so worked up because my brother’s in trouble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, your rage would have faded because you had gotten no damage, but you also could have used your bonus action last turn for your rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which I totally whispered, but just not loud enough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add 4 extra to what I told you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So cruel, so cruel, so cruel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush up in the air, and these were with disadvantage on all the attack rolls because you’re on your broom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First attack, nope, and I need you to roll a dexterity check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you stay on the broom, you don’t fall off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again for the third one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the last two still hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: oh no, do I have to roll again for -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You right yourself back up on the broom, but that’s the end of your turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, because that was the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My second one - can I use my bonus action? Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not in between my two attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to use it for?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to shoot the rakshasa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He’s a rakshasa. He’s an asshole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You’ve never actually fought one before, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don’t know why, but -

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: - he didn’t seem to be affected.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It’s the eye of the tiger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You try and focus your intent on attacking him and yet it doesn’t seem to find its form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit. Roll the last attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, I don’t get any additional -

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don’t you get any additional?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I don’t get any storm damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn’t say that was through the flaming bowstring, did I? Because I was so distracted by the Hunter’s Mark.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I’m going to cast Cure Wounds on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the rest of the party’s running through this hole.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How close can I get to the hole?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I’m going to go to there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you run around to that area there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I’m going to create a Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I send it down to the rakshasa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don’t know where the rakshasa is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don’t know where the rakshasa is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just see a hole in the stone wall that everyone’s rushing through and that’s the most that you know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so you know what? Can I nix that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I’m going to cast Shield of Faith on myself.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So that will bring me up to - because I’m 13 right now with the shield?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I see that jerk who just threw the knife at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he ducked around the corner and Trinket gave chase.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I’m going to roll towards that corner as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come around the corner that way and you see Trinket harrying the guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) I’m taking some shots at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (tssh) This one actually hits him right above the pectoral muscle and blows him back, now almost leaning against the stairs, these two big wounds right in the middle of his chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you’ll probably have mercy on him, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) I can’t count when you do that. 24.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I get a -5 to my attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eyes roll back as Trinket lunges and tears the throat out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I keep running by them right up the hill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That’s as far as you make it, full movement.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, are all the assassins gone now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine’s dead and yours is dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don’t know about any others.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He smoked both of them, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trinket’s the best at killing dead guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is so good at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone rushes in, the rakshasa glares around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hope he’s got a Counterspell...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) When you’re a Jet, you’re a Jet all the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It’s a Beautiful Mind moment right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He does want to join Vox Monica.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is what it's like on this end, going, "what the fuck do I do?" Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, there’s a mathematical equation for your stripes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, he reads thoughts but he gets them backwards, sometimes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He’s thinking about that great Loot Crate deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: - if I set off a thermonuclear bomb in my pocket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hotis is going to look up at the creature that just flew in on the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right as the eye contact hits you -

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He’s going to fucking Finger of Death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to roll a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was he doing? What was the effect?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was what he did to me the last time we faced him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only half of us know how this fucker works.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now he does nothing at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don’t know what he is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was just - was it just me and you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, it was just me and you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we’ve never, we have no...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he’s going to get quite a way aways from you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade is not at your feet, so you can punch him if you want as he runs by.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, if he runs away I can cast a spell on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can cast when you’re on your back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it’s not the rule, though, I don’t want any preferential -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You’re on the ground after falling from the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I’m hurt, so maybe it wouldn’t work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to cast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, what I was going to cast before he ran away was Bigby’s Hand and try to grapple him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you create Bigby’s Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what level is Bigby’s Hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It twice more tries to reach out, And the rakshasa shrugs it off like it’s nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if it were a foot? Would that have the same effect?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It’s just the number of fingers, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far is he from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You’re still prone on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I’ll use half of my movement to get up, and I will stare daggers at him and cast Eyebite against him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll sing, "(singing) I hate rakasha, so put another arrow in his body, baby! (others join in singing): "I hate rakasha, "so come and take the time and fight with me!" (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he looks back at you as you’re singing out loud and chuckles to himself -

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck! But it was a good song!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a very good song.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Petition to Chris Perkins to rename it “rakasha.”

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what, he’s impervious to spells? How did that happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have two more squares, if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I’m in a lot of pain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I’ll heal you again with a - I can only do a level 1 bonus action with a Healing Word, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, then I’ll do a level 2 Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Scanlan’s turn. Grog, you’re up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see them at all from the roof?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever this creature is, is now in the distance, trying to run back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I jump off the roof into the courtyard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, (landing thud) you leap and it’s a very small step down (footstep)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I make it look like I landed really hard!

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: When was the last time you saw us before Kiki found you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dinner would have been the last time, yes."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It may know more secrets than you think it does, "which makes it that much more important "that we eliminate it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll put it on the list.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He could be following us for a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He could rat us out to the dragons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe not before the Vestiges, but on the list.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we can put some manpower towards discovering where he is and where he lies while we continue our search for the Vestiges, and then once we have a solid lead, we can follow it through.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I go over to the dead body that Kima threw into the middle of the room and cast Speak With Dead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it like (krsch) Halloween mask inside-out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I reach up under his nasal cavity and I pop his face back out just a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a deflated soccer ball, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slowly sits up and turns towards you, Pike, going, "(rasping groans)"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did the rakshasa know to find us here? How did Hotis know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How did Hotis know to find us here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many of them were there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many of you were there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where were they all supposed to meet when everything was finished?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or who would know more than him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is his boss or something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or who does he report to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who does he report to in The Clasp?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have one job on this ship.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: It's stupid - ASHLEY AND TRAVIS: (shouting) - but I'm going to do it! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, the last bit of air that had been trapped in the chest cavity has been utilized and the body (rasping groan) goes back to its still rest, no longer moving, no longer puppeteered by your divine energies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Gilmore's like, "(weak chuckle) I actually have one that's pretty rough "in my place right now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you kill one or two?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the only one that's missing in action is the one that I shoved out the window?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we're waiting for news on whether that one -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is there one that was left alive?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, there was one that was shoved out a window, so hopefully he died.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Broke his legs and his heart never woke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At some point, Percy, ask Gilmore about that robe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't put it down yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He's holding it like a pair of soiled underpants, all -

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've actually been using Bad News like a -

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was attached to your skin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Peeling the skin off my flesh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, why don't you take it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't wish to have this part of my repertoire."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If we destroy it, though, would that hurt Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if you've removed it from him, "then the enchantment's been broken."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So does it - do you have to - anyone you put it on, it curses them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's not a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just don't put it on because you think it will be fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look way better mostly naked, so don't -

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll just keep it in the Bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are your guards very well-trained in tracking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I can send him to help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also, I might add, in theory, have a wolf patrolling the area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm sure he's aware that there's a commotion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, hand that over, big guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(stuttering) I wouldn't say I know everything about everything."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pretty sure we know everything, but she more than I."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We found this in a tomb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you tell anything about it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Other than the fact that it smells really bad?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can you tell me about it? It belonged to a god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It looks like it has the capability "to resist most elements when given the instruction, "and it safeguards the life of the bearer "and it looks like there's some sort of a - "Tell you what. Follow me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he stops and he goes, "It's really me this time! Follow me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks up to the very edge with you and goes, "Do you trust me?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that moment, you suddenly, instinctively, look up and from outside the back of the armor, (fwwsh) -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: - these giant black raven wings spill out from the sides.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, so you could have flown when you came out of the dragon?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only if I know how to work it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that this feature to the armor was only recently -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go from falling to swooping over the forest on the outside of Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he's The Crow! He's The Crow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can fly? HE can fucking fly?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After doing that, I double back and I fly up that same cliff and I lift Gilmore up in the sky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as this happens, the wings also wrap around and envelop the both of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then time seems to pass for a minute and as you release him, the wings (fluttering sound) scatter into black feathers in the wind and disappear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if you need any favors, I am your friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ow! Where were you, what the fuck - oh, you're -

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You flying fuck. You flying fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I forgot you were a rogue. Yeah...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (angry noise) I mean, congratulations, it's really cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) And I'll be less of a fuckwit lately, I promise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm slowly - I'm going to walk in and have a moment and look Vax over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Shaun? Once in a while? All the time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that's once every dawn, that can return to you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) That would have been really funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But once per day, you give yourself a fly speed of 60.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (yelling after him) You're hard to read, man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cask of ale is out and the ale is flowing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could spend the night tracking him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know who he's going back to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know he's going back to Stillben.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys are going to drink for a bit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go out past the wall and see if I can yell for the wolf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I’m bringing a swath from one of the -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You shout out for about 10, 15 minutes or so before you hear a distant howl. (howl)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you find him, we would be forever grateful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(licks chops)" Licks his deep, pearly-white bladed incisors and turns around and - "(grunts)" - takes off into the forest at triple-speed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I’m going to go up and have a drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all appreciate the friendship that you’ve maintained, the survival of those that were endangered, and eventually find yourself, rather tipsy, finding your way back to bed, this time with quadruple the guards at the door -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're still at the hit point value that you had before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I can't use hit dice, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to have some - I'm going to have - What's the D&D term for Bloody Mary? I need a mimosa or a Bloody Mary and I'm going to take a rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little hair of the dog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Technically, hair of the dog would be poisoning him again this morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually take the time to go ahead and rest up, and even then, your body's just restless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're basically rocking in place and playing over the imagery in your mind over and over again, and there's a perpetual cold sweat across your brow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is all I wanted to say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I open the door, scratching my arm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is wrong with you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you get Allura for me, maybe? Send Allura to my room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, yeah, she's not in the castle, but I can find -

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you go fly over there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I fly off and I go try to find Allura.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go have diarrhea in the chamber pot in my room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Talk to your daggers while you do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi. You guys rest okay? Everything all right?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She grabs her maul from the side of the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Allura in here, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, she's - would you like some coffee?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come inside, you can smell coffee brewing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does she have that beautiful but messy morning hair that takes two hours to prep for a movie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no. Her hair is perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Way too well put together for being this early in the conscious day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How the fuck does she do it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not exactly sure what's going on, but he looked terrible, and he thought maybe you would be able to help?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you're not a cleric, but - I don't know, he seemed to think he could use your help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's go have a look, then." And so they go ahead and they walk back with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to get some more coffee.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You hear a whisper from the coffee mug saying, "I own you." (all laugh)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You didn't perception check the cup!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog passes by you in the hallway, and you see Vax, hand against the wall, walking by, looking dazed and a little weary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Like, the shits or the twirls?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know what you mean now. Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I jump into a side door -

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (dryly) Wow, I've never heard of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You proudly hear, through the doorway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm talking about Liam, not Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you've had the twirls, you never forget them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As time passes, eventually your sister, Allura, and Kima make their way towards you to go ahead and check in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he still in the toilet or did he get out yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) I'm new to this, but - Can I cast Lay on Hands on myself?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the worst. Can you help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kima, have you any ideas?" "Here! Let me have a look at you." She pulls you down to her position, just pushing your eyelids open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grog, do you want to help me with this?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Open your mouth, stick out your tongue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not going to slip me the digit, are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kima, you see anything in there? Any bumps? Mumps?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pull his tongue a little bit more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I wake up and come out into the hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys walk out and see as Allura sits back with a slight chuckle next to Vex, as you see both Grog and Kima manhandling a very exhausted-looking Vax in the center of the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's funny to you, eh?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you guys looking for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He shit and puked all over the area in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to make a Medicine check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I ate them, and I was fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? The crab cakes messed with me a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. You push Kima aside and take a very intense look at his body.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Move aside, move aside, move aside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you try on him, Pike?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you cursed? Is he cursed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he still have the brooch on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The brooch that was given to him by Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this the skull I gave you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's a cast of - the skull you gave me is still in my bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My brother, puking his guts out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. Allura, what did you try?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did he just throw up everywhere?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let it out. Let it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I attempted to dispel, "in case there was any spell that was still sustained on him."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima goes, "Not really my specialty at the moment. My apologies."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll do it. I'll do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike and I will tag-team a Greater Restoration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, if you're feeling gross, you can imagine - go examine the leftovers over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there some vomit in the corner?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, yep. Just make sure you crawl in on your hands and knees.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go poke at it just to see if there's anything in there that looks funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only some of it is vomit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have siblings, I've seen this before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as it dissipates, you're still exhausted, and still lost an entire evening's worth of rest, but whatever was keeping you in that nightmarish realm of stasis seems to have been dispelled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your midsection is very sore from the constant flexing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did Pike and I notice anything when we ripped out this darkness from his chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather that there was some curse that had taken hold of his body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather, probably something to do with the rakshasa, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, can I have your jug for a moment?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to get some water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I have some ass-water, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no. Just regular water, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jug fills up with clear, cool water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure that won't make me throw up, as well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no signs of poisoning in any of the remains, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. In fact, you spend probably a good 3 to 4 minutes pushing through Vax refuse while nobody else has thought to actually come and stop you when they've already figured out what the problem was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He still feels bad, keep looking!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep going. It might be clues.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will take - if I don't see anything in 3 minutes -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems fairly standard bile and excrement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it basic or acid? We don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you done with the jug? Can I have that back, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, does that thing make mimosas?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, there's one way to find out. Mimosas, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ask for Bloody Marys. Bloody Marys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it not work anymore? Ask for mayonnaise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, you put a lot of stress on it, all right? It made your ass-water just fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you ask for some ale?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I think it only works for a little bit every day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we just found a loophole!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I drink some and then pass it over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's probably bad for you right now, but that's all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this breakfast beer is perfectly reasonable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It needs to go to a bartending class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you hear a guard's voice shout, "Hail, Vox Machina! Downstairs, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take one more big sip and toss it at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, are you still reading this morning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you get a full night's rest, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you guys head downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you get there, the front gates to Whitestone castle - no, the front doors to the main entranceway are partially open and the guards are waiting there as you see a shadow step in from the outside daylight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I light up my hands in defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see step inside to the center of the castle, a very large, dark-furred wolf carrying something within his jaws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drops down on the ground another dark-cloaked figure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a snapped neck on this individual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, could not escape the ever-watching vigil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we might as well let him keep his prize.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check the body for bits and then the rest is his.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to check the body to see if I can find anything useful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually find about 320 gold pieces on the body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we inspect any of the other bodies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was a lot going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He could have a look at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you find what looks to be a fist-sized glass sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fist-sized glass sphere, about that big.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to walk out towards our beast here and hold out my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He head-butts the palm of your hand and then runs his head under it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Percy, can I touch him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there's an immediate familiarity with you that wasn't there before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to be friends with me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go give him a pet, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I put my hand out to him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's all right. She's all right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try scratching at his ear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, and he seems to begrudgingly give into it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I check out the sphere that I'm looking at?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are free to do with this as you will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it out of the castle, gets it out of your way, and then begins to step back down the walkway path south of the castle, making his way back towards Whitestone and the surrounding forest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When it was at rest, it had no real motion, but as you shake it, it swirls on the inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit! I made something happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll stop by Gilmore's on our way back up to the front hall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura, do you know what this is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she throws it back to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it can only be used for 10 minutes and it cannot be used until the next dawn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can it be used by anybody?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And what can it see, precisely?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you can scry for anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As per the spell. Once per day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you're so nosy, so it's perfect for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really, really like this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd like it so those who should not know that Whitestone even exists do not."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything we can do to help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the two of you, "I think we could map out a plot to head it off at the pass, "and when you return and are ready, head into the hells ourselves "and take it down while there's still time."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would be glad to help.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can come back to you guys at any time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We tend to need you a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can give her one of the stones.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughs) Ish. I will try to be there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have the other one, currently.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll keep this with me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you keep practicing to be a monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you write down "gate stone" on your inventory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (louder) Thank you for keeping my home safe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, at least it's not as far as Vasselheim.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. And maybe I'll meet you very soon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We got him once. I can get him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you off to, then?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd say one more proper night's sleep, then into the Feywild.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we can return from the Feywild immediately and in theory, be right back here when we're finished, and perhaps by then we'll have an avenue of attack to this rakshasa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we can just pop on in there because of you, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to make you a beast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we take a quick walk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figure we would take one full night's sleep -

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before I take us in? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We plan to leave at dawn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We plan to leave at dawn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You thought it was stupid when I said it, but what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right on thirty is fine, if you say 9:00, 9:30.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take a walk with Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just have a Trapper-Keeper full of appointments?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just walk down the path from Whitestone castle?
